::Slayer::

Slayer smiles. At least someone was acknoledging his attack. They 
might get a few bots afterall.

"I'm right here," he says, walking up to Megaton a bit and motioning 
for Zoe to follow. He wasn't sure if Megaton was hostile or not.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton swings in low, he sees the general area the shots had come 
from and
> lands between Slayer and the Cybertronian Fire. The dragon turns in 
the
> direction Slayer had fired from, spread his enormous wingspan to 
it's limits
> knowing his armored scales would protect him. With an earthshaking 
ROAR he
> lowers his head.
> 
> A mischievious grin covered his dark face as his inset eyes scanned 
the
> field. He couldn't yet see Slayer but he knew the bot was there. 
Megaton
> could smell him.
> 
> "Why don't you come out where I can see you?" the dragon asks "We'll
> 'discuss' the problem you have with these maximals." The scent 
wasn't
> Predacon, at least none of the ones
